#summary Specs for different types of output files
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

== Text-based Output ==
Formatting for text-based output:
{{{
<genes width="Width of Image" height="Height of Image">
  <genome gen="Your Generation Number Here">
    [(R,G,B,O)<(x,y),(x,y),(x,y)...>,(R,G,B,O)<(x,y),(x,y),(x,y)...>,(R,G,B,O)<(x,y),(x,y),(x,y)...>...]
  </genome>
  <genome gen="Your Generation Number Here">
    <polygon>
      <fill>
        <red>Red Value From 0 to 255</red>
        <green>Green Value From 0 to 255</red>
        <blue>Blue Value From 0 to 255</blue>
        <opacity>Opacity Value From 0 to 255</opacity>
      </fill>
      <points>
         <pair>
           <x></x>
           <y></y>
         </pair>
      </points>
  </genome>
</genome>
 
<difference format="Your Format Here">
  <Gen Number>--<Gen Number># <Difference Value>
  <Gen Number>--<Gen Number># <Difference Value>
...
</difference>
}}}
